scenes.beat: Mei watches Lin tend flowers from her bedroom patio at Lu Xian, eyes filled with mystery longing.

frames.camera_position: extreme wide from latticed window, capturing full patio and distant florist shop
frames.prompt: Camera positioned in extreme wide from the latticed window of the wooden pavilion, framing the full expanse of Mei's bedroom patio overlooking the courtyard toward the humble florist shop below, where dawn's first blush infiltrates through paper screens. Mei leans against the lacquered sill, her pale skin luminous, dark hair pinned with jade ornaments slightly askew, chin tilted toward the lattice with gaze unfocused on distant cypress silhouettes, fingertips pressing the lacquer sill with the weight of held breath, micro-tension rippling through her embroidered silk collar as shoulders subtly hunch in mystery longing. Depth layers chain artistically: foreground silk cushions slumped in soft focus against worn wooden railing, midground sharpens on Mei's hanfu robes of ivory silk with visible weave imperfections at the hem brushing patio stones, background dissolves into courtyard haze where flower buckets gleam faintly and pressed dirt paths wind toward Lin's shop under cream-striated sky. Dawn light acts as active force, spilling golden accents across jade pins and pooling in hollows of her melancholic beauty, casting long shadows from latticed bars that striate her form like unspoken desires, while far florist blooms catch individual petals in soft glow against burnt umber wooden structures. Material textures breathe wear: hanfu silk raw and crosshatched with faint thread pulls from nightly repose, lacquer sill chipped at edges from years of leaning elbows, distant flower buckets of splintered wood holding wilting peonies with dew-kissed petals frayed by handling. Beyond, Lin's simple cotton robes hang loose on his frame, weathered hands parting stems with kind eyes distant. ; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, dawn natural light, 35mm film grain

frames.camera_position: wide shot from shop entrance, framing humble wooden structure interior
frames.prompt: Camera in wide shot from the weathered shop entrance, encompassing the humble wooden confines where flower buckets line pressed dirt floor, Lin centered at rough-hewn table under swaying lantern. Lin, humble florist with weathered hands and kind eyes, unfolds the note with tentative fingers, face illuminated as secret noble heritage and love for Mei unveil, shoulders squaring subtly under simple cotton robes, gaze lifting from paper to unfocused horizon. Foreground crowds with wilting lotus blooms drooping in buckets soft-focused, midground sharpens note's inked revelations amid scattered petals, background layers wooden beams scarred by seasons into dusk-veiled mountains distant. Lantern light surges as revelatory force, bathing his lined face in honeyed warmth that catches threads in cotton collar, casting petal shadows dancing across dirt floor strewn with pressed earth grit. Textures vivid: cotton robes patched at elbows with visible stitching wear, paper note crinkled and ink-faded, wooden table gouged from knife work, flower stems fibrous and thorn-pricked. Micro-tensions: knuckles blanching on paper edge, breath catching as eyes trace lineage script, lips curving in dawning smile. Buckets occupy lower third haze, table midground anchors heritage scroll, dissolving into night-shrouded road beyond open door; jade-green leaves catch glow, gold accents faint in imagined nobility; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, warm lantern haze, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: medium close-up three-quarter from camera left at chest height
frames.prompt: Camera positioned medium close-up three-quarter from camera left at chest height, centered on Lin's face as lantern light unveils the note's truths of noble blood and unspoken love for Mei. Kind eyes widen beneath furrowed brow, weathered hands cradle paper with micro-tremor, fingers tracing calligraphy revealing heritage, lips parting on silent wonder, cotton robe's collar shifting with accelerated pulse. Foreground softens lantern cord swaying gently, midground locks on note's elegant script and his illuminated profile, background blurs flower buckets into verdant bokeh pierced by wooden slats. Lantern glow invades as emotional tide, flooding cheekbones with golden rivulets that thread individual hairs in beard stubble, hurling table's petal debris into flickering shadow play. Material textures intimate: cotton weave coarse and sun-faded with mend marks, paper brittle-edged from secretive folds, dirt floor compacted with boot prints and petal dust. Micro-tensions build: jaw tightening then softening, gaze flickering from note to Mei's imagined form, hand rising to touch jade pendant hidden beneath robe. Petals scatter foreground hush, note dominates midground revelation, shop eaves recede to starry void; noble silk memories clash humble reality in his enlightened eyes; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, flickering lantern intimacy, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: close-up from above note, looking down at Lin's hands
frames.prompt: Camera in close-up from directly above the note on table, gazing down at Lin's weathered hands unveiling noble heritage script and Mei's name entwined in love's confession, lantern light pooling thereon. Fingers splay with restrained awe, thumbs pressing edges where ink bleeds faintly, veins prominent under skin toughened by earth toil, subtle quiver betraying heart's upheaval. Foreground captures petal fragment adhered to paper in razor focus, midground expands to hands' calluses cradling revelation, background fades table grain into lantern's hazy corona. Light from swaying lantern acts as awakening force, drenching inked characters in liquid gold that ignites cotton sleeve cuffs with threadbare highlights, casting elongated finger shadows across dirt-strewn wood. Textures layered: paper crinkled with secretive creases and wax seal remnants, hands scarred from thorns with dirt under nails, table lacquerless and knot-veined from years' service. Micro-tensions: pinky curls involuntarily, knuckles flexing as love's weight sinks in, breath's warmth fogging edge faintly. Flower buckets frame lower depth softly, note's calligraphy pierces midground heart, shop's thatched roof hints starry night beyond; gold jewelry imagined in heritage gleam contrasts humble palms; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, overhead lantern pool, 35mm film grain.

scenes.beat: Mei wins Go wager; Min Zhu concedes, stakes clear as freedom matches her savings.

frames.camera_position: medium shot over Mei's shoulder toward Go board
frames.prompt: Camera positioned medium shot over Mei's slender shoulder, looking past her jade-pinned hair toward the Go board where her final white stone seals victory, stakes of freedom matching savings now clear. Mei leans forward with poised grace, melancholic eyes alight with triumph, fingers placing stone decisively, hanfu silk rippling at arms. Min Zhu slumps opposite, corpulent form deflating in concession, hand waving surrender amid flashy robes. Foreground veils her embroidered collar in soft silk sheen, midground crystallizes board's territorial conquest with stones encircled, background blurs latticed window to courtyard lanterns. Lantern light triumphs as victorious surge, flooding board in radiant pools that catch jade comb glints and Min Zhu's gold rings dully, shadowing his strained silk into defeat's fold. Textures rich: Go stones glossy-worn from play, silk robes frayed at Min Zhu's cuffs with dragon embroidery unraveling, lacquered table etched faintly. Micro-tensions: Mei's breath releases in quiet exhale, Min Zhu's jowls quiver on nod. Cushions foreground hush, board midground battlefield won, screens dissolve to night; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, triumphant lantern glow, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: close-up centered on Go board from table level
frames.prompt: Camera in close-up centered on Go board from table level, capturing Mei's winning stone amid white dominance over Min Zhu's blundered blacks, wager's freedom stakes etched in pattern's clarity. Stones cluster in final encirclement, white capturing black voids representing bankruptcy-conceded savings. Foreground sharpens decisive white stone's polish, midground maps gridlines of strategy won, background hints players' shadows. Lantern flicker animates as conclusive force, rippling light across ebony-white contrasts, illuminating wear-pits and wood grain scars. Textures dominate: stones smooth generations-worn, lines incised deep with use, table lacquer chipped. No hands intrude, tension in frozen battle; cushions peek foreground, lattice glows beyond; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, strategic lantern flicker, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: medium close-up three-quarter on Min Zhu's face
frames.prompt: Camera positioned medium close-up three-quarter on Min Zhu's corpulent face conceding defeat, eyes downcast in resignation as freedom slips to Mei's savings-match. Jowls sag, lips mutter concession, gold jewelry dull under light, flashy silk collar sweat-stained. Foreground softens ringed hand gesturing defeat, midground his flushed features, background Mei's triumphant silhouette. Lantern light recedes as humbling force, dimming his opulence to shadowed folds, highlighting weave flaws. Textures: silk heavy-frayed, rings etched worn, skin oiled-weathered. Micro-tension: sigh escapes, gaze avoids hers; board reflects loss; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, dimming lantern defeat, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: close-up on Mei's face from front
frames.prompt: Camera in close-up on Mei's pale face, melancholic beauty radiant in victory, eyes gleaming with freedom's promise as wager concludes. Chin lifts, jade pins catch light, lips curve subtle smile. Foreground her embroidered collar threads, midground porcelain skin, background board haze. Lantern glow elevates as liberating force, gilding cheekbones, threading hair silks. Textures: hanfu raw-weave, jade filigreed-dulled. Micro-tension: breath steadies triumphantly; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, victorious close lantern, 35mm film grain.

scenes.beat: Zhoa storms Lu Xian, exposing Madame Chou's rigged auction favoring Min Zhu's bribes.

frames.camera_position: extreme wide from courtyard entrance, sweeping multi-story facade
frames.prompt: Camera in extreme wide from courtyard entrance, framing Lu Xian brothel's wooden pavilion as Zhoa storms threshold, military uniform commanding under lanterns. Zhoa strides stern-faced, exposing rigged auction, Madame Chou recoils in elaborate silks nearby, Min Zhu shrinks. Foreground lanterns sway, midground doors burst open, background paper screens illuminate. Lanterns blaze as accusatory force, gilding Zhoa's armor, shadowing Chou's jade rings. Textures: uniform crisp-creased, silks ornate-frayed. Micro-tension: Zhoa's fist clenched; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, stormy lantern blaze, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: medium shot facing Zhoa head-on at waist level
frames.prompt: Camera positioned medium shot facing Zhoa head-on at waist level, capturing his storming advance exposing bribes, stern face unyielding, uniform arms visible gesturing accusation. Foreground lantern glows, midground his commanding presence, background Chou's calculating gaze falters. Light thrusts forward, etching uniform textures worn from campaigns, casting Chou's silks to shadow. Jade rings glint desperately; micro-tension: jaw set; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, confrontational lantern thrust, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: over-the-shoulder from Madame Chou toward Zhoa
frames.prompt: Camera over Madame Chou's shoulder, looking past jade-ringed hand toward Zhoa's exposing tirade, her calculating eyes widen in shock. Foreground silk shoulder, midground Zhoa's stern accusation, background brothel chaos. Lanterns probe guiltily, illuminating ring etchings, shadowing Zhoa's form. Textures: silks elaborate-worn, uniform stern; micro-tension: Chou's flinch; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, exposing OTS lantern, 35mm film grain.

scenes.beat: Mei reunites with Lin on pressed dirt road, embracing under stars with newfound truths.

frames.camera_position: wide shot from roadside lantern, framing road under stars
frames.prompt: Camera in wide shot from roadside lantern, encompassing pressed dirt road where Mei and Lin reunite embracing, truths unveiled under starry vault, wooden buildings flank distant mountains. Mei in flowing hanfu presses to Lin's cotton robes, arms entwining, faces close in joy. Foreground dirt ruts soft, midground their full figures merge, background lanterns dot eaves. Starlight and lanterns weave tenderly, gilding silks and cottons, veiling mountains in umber. Textures: dirt compacted-bootworn, robes mismatched yet harmonious; micro-tension: hesitant then firm clasp; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, starry lantern embrace, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: medium shot three-quarter circling embrace
frames.prompt: Camera positioned medium shot three-quarter around Mei and Lin's waist-up embrace, her jade pins against his kind eyes, truths binding them. Hands grip tenderly, faces nuzzle. Foreground lantern fringe, midground torsos meld, background road fades. Light caresses intimately, threading collar weaves. Textures: hanfu smooth-imperfect, cotton patched; micro-tension: shared breath; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, emotional lantern caress, 35mm film grain.

frames.camera_position: close-up on their faces pressed close
frames.prompt: Camera in close-up on Mei and Lin's faces pressed cheek-to-cheek under stars, melancholic beauty meets kind gaze, lips curve in whispered truths. Foreground faint jade glint, midground profiles glow, background star-pricked sky. Lantern-starlight unites softly, illuminating skin textures. Micro-tension: eyes lock eternally; cinematic still, Tang Dynasty China, starry close intimacy, 35mm film grain.
